about_the_game:
In the new era, humans embrace AI for communication through thought alone, abandoning traditional keyboards and internet emojis. Keyboard warriors, leading emoji shooters, battle virus-infected internet monsters to protect the last digital sanctuaries.

Casino! Roguelike! Tower Defense!

  • In the game, players face waves of internet monsters;
  • Players must select appropriate emoji shooters and items to place in formation, which are randomly distributed with a chance to deal high damage.

Props and soldiers are matched in thousands of ways

  • Two identical soldiers or items on the field can be merged to upgrade to higher quality, creating a unique defense force with a bit of thought.
  • The myriad combinations of soldiers and items allow endless experimentation with various styles, unlocking rare soldiers and items as battles progress, overturning traditional genres.

EMOJI soldiers assemble!

  • Each round of combat allows the purchase of new soldiers and items, with positions randomly rearranged based on the enemy's direction to focus firepower on strong foes.

The Internet monster is coming!

  • There's a chance to purchase legendary items that can significantly enhance combat capabilities, but the cost is great, requiring careful balance in your item combinations.
  • Of course, clearing the game not only requires great wisdom and cautious strategy but also a bit of "luck"!
